column1: #Text=When leading up to the festival season , one of the main things on almost everybody 's mind is choosing the perfect festival outfit .
#Text=Festivals can hold up to anywhere between 1 thousand and 100 thousand people , so there is a large feeling of pressure to look good and have no wardrobe malfunctions .
#Text=However it can be a bit hard to find the " perfect " outfit so we 've compiled this easy 5 step process to help you choose the right outfit for you !
#Text=You must plan ahead if you want your outfit to stand out from the crowd !
#Text=This involves asking yourself a few questions about the festival , such as - " Is there a certain style associated with this festival ?
